description.english: Choose to drink in Mingyue Rao's room.
description.schinese: 在明月娆房间选择喝酒
description.token: Choose to drink in Mingyue Rao's room.

description.english: See Lin Miaoxian take a bath and choose to pretend to be blind
description.schinese: 看到林妙仙洗澡选择假装失明
description.token: See Lin Miaoxian take a bath and choose to pretend to be blind

displayName.english: Drop the cup as the number.
displayName.token: Drop the cup as the number.

description.english: Choose the number of wrestling cup when Mingyue Rao wants the formula.
description.schinese: 在明月娆要配方时选择摔杯为号
description.token: Choose the number of wrestling cup when Mingyue Rao wants the formula.

displayName.english: Random punches to kill the old master 1
displayName.token: Random punches to kill the old master 1

description.english: In the case of fake wine, choose to fight for it according to reason.
description.schinese: 假酒事件，选择据理力争
description.token: In the case of fake wine, choose to fight for it according to reason.

description.english: Gu Qiuhan was arrested in Jishantang and chose the newspaper official.
description.schinese: 顾秋寒在积善堂被抓，选择报官
description.token: Gu Qiuhan was arrested in Jishantang and chose the newspaper official.

description.english: Gu Qiuhan was caught in Jishantang and chose to climb the wall.
description.schinese: 顾秋寒在积善堂被抓，选择翻墙
description.token: Gu Qiuhan was caught in Jishantang and chose to climb the wall.

description.english: Being chased and killed by Yan 21, he chose to expose the truth.
description.schinese: 被燕二十一追杀，选择揭露真相
description.token: Being chased and killed by Yan 21, he chose to expose the truth.

description.english: Being chased and killed by Yan 21, chose to threaten.
description.schinese: 被燕二十一追杀，选择威胁
description.token: Being chased and killed by Yan 21, chose to threaten.

description.english: Choose Uncle Da to dance on stage.
description.schinese: 选择达叔上台跳舞
description.token: Choose Uncle Da to dance on stage.

displayName.english: Random punches to kill the old master 2
displayName.token: Random punches to kill the old master 2

description.english: The customer asked for a refund and chose not to.
description.schinese: 顾客要求退钱，选择不退
description.token: The customer asked for a refund and chose not to.

description.english: Threatened by Zhang Zixu, he chose to sell restaurants.
description.schinese: 被张子虚威胁，选择卖酒楼
description.token: Threatened by Zhang Zixu, he chose to sell restaurants.

description.english: Gu Qiuhan left the restaurant and chose to bless and enter the ending.
description.schinese: 顾秋寒离开酒楼，选择祝福并进入结局
description.token: Gu Qiuhan left the restaurant and chose to bless and enter the ending.

description.english: The king met and chose to shout for help.
description.schinese: 王爷会面，选择大声呼救
description.token: The king met and chose to shout for help.

description.english: The report raised a rebellion, but the princess didn't like it enough and chose to agree.
description.schinese: 王爷提出造反，郡主好感不够，选择同意
description.token: The report raised a rebellion, but the princess didn't like it enough and chose to agree.

displayName.english: In the heyday of Daning, I am the wise king.
displayName.token: In the heyday of Daning, I am the wise king.

description.english: The report raised a rebellion, and the princess liked it enough, so she chose to talk about conditions.
description.schinese: 王爷提出造反，郡主好感足够，选择谈条件
description.token: The report raised a rebellion, and the princess liked it enough, so she chose to talk about conditions.

description.english: The sovereign rebelled and chose not to agree with the larger foe.
description.schinese: 王爷提出造反，选择不同意和鱼死网破
description.token: The sovereign rebelled and chose not to agree with the larger foe.

description.english: The ending choice is with Lin Miaoxian.
description.schinese: 结局选择和林妙仙在一起
description.token: The ending choice is with Lin Miaoxian.

description.english: The ending choice is with Gongxingbai.
description.schinese: 结局选择和宫星白在一起
description.token: The ending choice is with Gongxingbai.

displayName.english: Make it bigger and stronger and create resplendence
displayName.token: Make it bigger and stronger and create resplendence

description.english: The ending choice is with Qinger.
description.schinese: 结局选择和晴儿在一起
description.token: The ending choice is with Qinger.

description.english: The ending choice is with Mingyue Rao.
description.schinese: 结局选择和明月娆在一起
description.token: The ending choice is with Mingyue Rao.

description.english: The ending choice is with Gu Qiuhan.
description.schinese: 结局选择和顾秋寒在一起
description.token: The ending choice is with Gu Qiuhan.

description.english: The end of being alone.
description.schinese: 孤身一人的结局
description.token: The end of being alone.

description.english: Achieve all the endings
description.schinese: 达成所有结局
description.token: Achieve all the endings

description.english: Qinger was very sad and chose to pretend not to see it.
description.schinese: 晴儿很难过，选择假装没看见
description.token: Qinger was very sad and chose to pretend not to see it.

description.english: Qinger was very sad and chose to take advantage of it.
description.schinese: 晴儿很难过，选择趁虚而入
description.token: Qinger was very sad and chose to take advantage of it.

description.english: Qinger has a lot of work pressure, so she chooses to substitute for persuasion.
description.schinese: 晴儿工作压力大，选择代入劝解
description.token: Qinger has a lot of work pressure, so she chooses to substitute for persuasion.

description.english: Missed the magician.
description.schinese: 没有打中魔术师
description.token: Missed the magician.

description.english: When a rogue bullies a lady, he chooses to pretend to be a coward.
description.schinese: 遇到流氓欺负小姑娘，选择装怂
description.token: When a rogue bullies a lady, he chooses to pretend to be a coward.

description.english: Xiaochi's teacher asked Gu Qiuhan for justice and chose to stand by.
description.schinese: 小驰的老师找顾秋寒讨公道，选择袖手旁观
description.token: Xiaochi's teacher asked Gu Qiuhan for justice and chose to stand by.

description.english: Xiaochi's teacher asked Gu Qiuhan for justice and chose tit for tat.
description.schinese: 小驰的老师找顾秋寒讨公道，选择针锋相对
description.token: Xiaochi's teacher asked Gu Qiuhan for justice and chose tit for tat.
